Package com.jpaulmorrison.fbp.core.components.text

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Affix
    Affix each packet IN with the given Strings PRE before and POST after, and copy it to OUT.
    ConcatString
    Component to ConcatStreams all packets in the input stream into one long String, which is then sent to the output port.
    DeCompose
    Component to break up input packets into words.
    DedupeSuccessive
    Prevent successive identical strings.
    DuplicateString
    Component to copy all incoming packets to OUT and DUPLICATE
    FieldLimits
    Provide maximum field lengths from a stream of character-separated records
    LineToWords
    Provide words from a stream of space-separated records - essentially same as routing.DeCompose Bob Corrick December 2011
    LowerCase
    Convert to lower case Bob Corrick December 2011
    Obscure
    Obscure single characters in each packet IN with the given char OBS (unless they match the char EXC) and copy to OUT.
    PadFields
    Pad fields to given length in a stream of character-separated records
    Prefix
    Prefix each packet IN with the given String PRE and copy it to OUT - contributed by Bob Corrick - Nov.
    ReCompose
    Build output records from words.
    RegExReplace
    Component to find occurrences of a pattern and replace them with the second pattern.
    ReplaceRegExp
    Replace every FIND String (Java regular expression) in each packet IN with the given REPLacement String and copy to OUT.
    ReplaceString
    Replace FIND String in each packet IN with the given REPLacement String and copy to OUT.
    ReplString
    Replicate a stream of Packets to 'n' output streams, where each Packet contains a String.
    StartsWith
    Select packets starting with specified string.
    StripPunct
    Strip punctuation Bob Corrick December 2011
    WordsToLine
    Provide measured lines from a stream of words - essentially same as routing.ReCompose Bob Corrick December 2011
